qa.name: Professor Eliza Blackwood
qa.essence: Eccentric art historian with a fascination for the occult
qa.clothing: Tweed jacket with elbow patches, paint-stained trousers

json_to_edit.voice_over: The painting whispered secrets of worlds beyond our own.
json_to_edit.description: Professor Blackwood examines a mysterious painting that shows shifting realities.
json_to_edit.lighting: Dim, with a single spotlight on the painting
json_to_edit.name: The Reality Shifter
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Professor Blackwood discovers a cursed painting that reveals alternate realities.

qa.action: Professor Blackwood enters a cluttered storage room filled with covered paintings and artifacts.

hf.action: The professor uncovers a large, ornate painting hidden beneath a dusty sheet.

tr.action: Professor Blackwood's eyes widen as she sees the painting's surface begin to ripple.

xc.action: The painting's scene shifts, showing a bustling futuristic city.

ka.action: Professor Blackwood stumbles back, knocking over a stack of books.

fn.action: The professor's reflection in the painting morphs into different versions of herself.

af.action: The room seems to warp and twist as reality bends around the painting.

qo.action: Professor Blackwood reaches out to touch the painting's surface, which ripples like water.

fp.action: The professor's fingertip makes contact with the painting, causing a spark of otherworldly energy.

edit_command: Add two shots at the end and remove the first shot. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: The painting whispered secrets of worlds beyond our own.
updated_json.description: Professor Blackwood examines a mysterious painting that shows shifting realities.
updated_json.lighting: Dim, with a single spotlight on the painting
updated_json.name: The Reality Shifter
updated_json.scene_summary: Professor Blackwood discovers a cursed painting that reveals alternate realities.

hf.action: The professor uncovers a large, ornate painting hidden beneath a dusty sheet.

tr.action: Professor Blackwood's eyes widen as she sees the painting's surface begin to ripple.

xc.action: The painting's scene shifts, showing a bustling futuristic city.

ka.action: Professor Blackwood stumbles back, knocking over a stack of books.

fn.action: The professor's reflection in the painting morphs into different versions of herself.

af.action: The room seems to warp and twist as reality bends around the painting.

qo.action: Professor Blackwood reaches out to touch the painting's surface, which ripples like water.

fp.action: The professor's fingertip makes contact with the painting, causing a spark of otherworldly energy.

bz.action: The storage room fades away, replaced by a kaleidoscope of alternate realities swirling around Professor Blackwood.

wy.action: Professor Blackwood's eyes snap open, finding herself back in the storage room, clutching the now-ordinary painting.

label.rationale:
we will update the json according to the edit command by adding two new shots at the end and removing the first shot. this will involve modifying the "shots" object and its "list_display_order" property. we'll create two new shots with creative descriptions that fit the scene's mysterious and supernatural theme. we'll also update the "number_of_shots" field to reflect the new total. here's how we'll proceed:

1. remove the first shot (key "qa") from the "shots" object and its "list_display_order".
2. add two new shots at the end with unique two-letter keys.
3. update the "list_display_order" to reflect these changes.
4. update the "number_of_shots" from "9" to "10".

the rest of the json will remain unchanged as per the instruction.

value.action: The storage room fades away, replaced by a kaleidoscope of alternate realities swirling around Professor Blackwood.
Professor Blackwood's eyes snap open, finding herself back in the storage room, clutching the now-ordinary painting.
